entities.name: professor mcgonagall

entities.name: eagle door knocker
entities.description: The eagle door knocker is an object that can talk and open doors, indicating it has some sort of magical or sentient property.

entities.name: amyus
entities.description: Amycus is a character in the story, introduced as someone who bursts into the room with a wand and is angry.

entities.name: alecto
entities.description: Alecto is a character in the story, introduced as someone who is sprawled motionless on the floor.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall replied to the eagle door knocker, indicating a response or reaction from one entity to another.
Amycus showed anger towards Alecto, indicated by his yell of fury and fear when he saw her on the floor.
